- General bug fixes
- New and improved weapon damage
- Reach checkpoint landmarks to save your loot
General bugfixes

Blades of Brim 1.0.1 is here and it's full of new stuff!
We still need YOU to battle through our kingdom - what are you waiting for?

• Midas Touch - Reforged for greatness!
• Facebook - Invite your friends and earn bragging rights!
• Treas

Blades of Brim 1.1 is Riding on a Storm!
We're always adding new content in our quest to destroy all goons! Let's go!

Blades of Brim version 2.0 is a major release! We have improved a great number of features to make an even better game.

CONTENT UPDATE

What's new?
• New Character (Wukong The Monkey King)

• New Weapons and Armor sets
• New Weapon Abilities

Blades of Brim 2.5 - Legacy of Flame!

Delve deeper in search of the legendary weapon from a lost kingdom!

What's new?
• The event ""Legacy of Flame"" is here, find the epic Crown of the Molten King!

NEW EVENTS
• Multiple events can run at the same time, adding a lot of variety to Blades of Brim. Can you complete them all?

WEAPON POWERS

Hello everyone, thank you for playing Blades of Brim! We've been doing some behind-the-scenes maintenance on the game. Nothing exciting, but super important - so we can make sure that the game is working perfectly for you all.
Have a great day, and ha

General bug fixes and performance improvements

Hello Brimlings, we have some fixes for you:

- Fix of a sot lock after updating from an older version
- Fix of player data loss
- Fix of wrong sky color transition
- FAQ added to the settings menu
- Fix of false “offline” status on the

Hello Everyone!
We got an exciting update for you.
We have added new ways to increase your score multiplier, to push your high score even further.
